posts.post_content:
Hello! Im looking to buy any of the following t206 HoF portrait. Registration and centering are my main points of focus.Wanting SGC40^ and PSA3.5^,may consider raw in same condition. No creases/paperloss/etc... Please PM with prices. Thank you.

Joe Tinker[Pending]
Ed Walsh
Eddie Collins
Walter Johnson
Ty Cobb[Green]
Nap Lajoie
Jake Beckley
Will also trade cash for portraits.:D

I have a nice PSA 2 Joe Tinker portrait (see below). Piedmont 150 back. There is a horizontal wrinkle upper left that accounts for the PSA 2 grade. Let me know if you're interested.  (Please email)    [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]

I have a nice Jake Beckley PSA 5 w/ Piedmont 350 back(see scan). Let me know if you're interested via email.    [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url] 

Thanks, Tim
Any interest in that sovereign psa 4 of Walsh?

Here's another Lajoie if you are still looking. 


[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/fortrade/large/T206%20Lajoie%20Port.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/fortrade/large/T206%20Lajoie%20Portrait%20back.jpg[/IMG]

Im sorry for delay in response, got busy with some things. :o

@ Greg - Nice card, it has me thinking for sure. Will lyk asap, if its still available?

@ Cory - I sent an email to you, please check spam if not received. The scans were so LARGE, I couldnt get a good look at the Walsh psa-4. Id like to see a smaller scan if possible.

@ Mike - Card pops Mike, has alot going for it. Is there a horizontal crease just below "CLEVELAND" on Nap's jersey?


All emails have been returned.

Thank you. Jeff
